en.welcome: Hi! I'm a brazilian fullstack developer with a lot of curiousity about the world. I currently study computer science and data scraping at Trybe. A few projects I've worked used the web conferencing system BigBlueButton and ASAAS API.

background.alt2: a man sitting with a notebook on his lap

projects.description1: A web chat made with socket.io, a cached database on the server and NoSQL database with MVC architecture
projects.description2: A Group project made in two weeks at Trybe
projects.description3: Project developed at Trybe using JWT for client tokenization and multer to upload files
projects.description5: A Kafka publisher and consumer that sends messages to Discord
